title: Inquiry-Ethnobotany (IEb) Learning Model for Medicinal Plant Utilization and Environmental Literacy Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational ecology and botany concepts, and general interest in environmental issues
context.additional_context: Students access Zoom sessions via personal devices, with group activities requiring real-time collaborative tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)

learning_goals: Students can identify five or more medicinal plants used in local communities and explain their ecological characteristics
Learners can write project reports proposing medicinal plant conservation plans by applying the Inquiry-Ethnobotany (IEb) model
Learners can demonstrate critical thinking in analyzing the relationship between medicinal plant resource utilization and environmental sustainability
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
